availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Christy (Hopkins County, KY, captain in the 10th Ky Cav (csa))

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Margaret L. Christy. Student in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Hopkins County in 1861. Served in the 10th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a captain from August 13, 1862 to 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 215A-B.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 0056.
"Capt John Christy," Find A Grave, Memorial #111102935, accessed October 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/111102935.
